attributes.action: Increase the £30,000 tax free sum for redundancy payments annually by RPI
attributes.additional_details: Increase the £30,000 tax free sum for redundancy/loss of office by the RPI/CPI annually.  This should be done also retrospectively to its date of introduction in order to raise it to today's correct value.  I have been in people management for 25 years and it has always remained static at £30,000 throughout that time.
